other_software.docker: Used to build and run a containerized PyTorch Lightning application.
other_software.nvidia-docker: Used for building and running Docker images on a GPU-enabled system.
other_software.nvidia-smi: Used to query and manage NVIDIA GPUs.

additional_info.script_purpose: This script appears to be a test script for a PyTorch Lightning application that utilizes a GPU. It utilizes SLURM for job management and Docker for containerization.
